snippet: Regulators have a frozen a Zurich-based account that reaped $1.7 million in gains from trading options before  the $23 billion takeover of H.J. Heinz was announced.
abstract: Regulators have a frozen a Zurich-based account that reaped $1.7 million in gains from trading options before  the $23 billion takeover of H.J. Heinz was announced.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: S.E.C., Suspecting Insider Trading, Freezes Account Over Heinz Buyout
headline.print_headline: S.E.C., Suspecting Insider Trading, Freezes Account Over Heinz Merger
